content-security-policy.name: content-security-policy
content-security-policy.score_description: Content Security Policy (CSP) implemented, but allows 'unsafe-eval'

cookies.name: cookies
cookies.score_description: Cookies set without using the Secure flag, but transmission over HTTP prevented by HSTS

cross-origin-resource-sharing.name: cross-origin-resource-sharing
cross-origin-resource-sharing.score_description: Content is visible via cross-origin resource sharing (CORS) files or headers, but is restricted to specific domains

redirection.name: redirection
redirection.score_description: Initial redirection from HTTP to HTTPS is to a different host, preventing HSTS

referrer-policy.name: referrer-policy
referrer-policy.score_description: Referrer-Policy header set unsafely to "origin", "origin-when-cross-origin", or "unsafe-url"

subresource-integrity.score_description: Subresource Integrity (SRI) not implemented, but all scripts are loaded from a similar origin
